pages.title: Vault Magnets
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Vault Magnets$() are a powerful utility item that can suck items on the floor towards you with great speeds, for Magnets to function, they need to be enabled, which can be done through a keybind or simply by right clicking it, additional it has Curio Support, making it work in a dedicated Magnet Slot.

pages.title: Magnet Types
pages.text: There are 3 Tiers of magnets, Weak Magnets, Strong Magnets & Omega Magnets.$(br)Both Strong and Omega magnets increase the pull range, however Omega magnets will directly teleport the items towards the player.

pages.title: Magnet Durability
pages.text: Each Itemstack picked up by the magnet will decrease the durability by $(#033dfc)1$(). To mitigate that, Magnets can be enchanted with $(#033dfc)Unbreaking$() and work with the $(#033dfc)Unbreakable$() talent. Additionally Items picked up that are blacklisted in the Vault Controller will $(#ff0000)not$() decrease durability.

pages.title: Repairing Magnets
pages.text: To repair Magnets, apply Magnetite to a Magnet inside an Anvil and it will restore $(#033dfc)10%$() of its durability, implying that there are $(#033dfc)Repairs remaining$().
